---
title: "tidy tuesday 2"
Author: "Rachel Babadzhanov"
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#install.packages("tidytuesdayR")
```
:::


## load libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.0     ✔ readr     2.1.4
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
✔ ggplot2   3.4.1     ✔ tibble    3.1.8
✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.1     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the ]8;;http://conflicted.r-lib.org/conflicted package]8;; to force all conflicts to become errors
```
:::
:::


## load data using the tidytuesdayR package


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2023-05-02')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
--- Compiling #TidyTuesday Information for 2023-05-02 ----
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
--- There are 3 files available ---
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
--- Starting Download ---
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Downloading file 1 of 3: `plots.csv`
	Downloading file 2 of 3: `species.csv`
	Downloading file 3 of 3: `surveys.csv`
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
--- Download complete ---
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plots <- tuesdata$plots
species <- tuesdata$species
surveys <- tuesdata$surveys
```
:::


## mice per year


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mice_count_by_year <- surveys %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  count()

ggplot(mice_count_by_year, aes(x= year, y=n))+
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()+
  ggtitle("Mice count by year")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1980,2020,5))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## mice per year by sex


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mice_count_by_year_sex <- surveys %>%
  group_by(year,sex) %>%
  count()

ggplot(mice_count_by_year_sex, aes(x= year, y=n, color=sex))+
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle("Mice count by year and sex")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1980,2020,5))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## mice per year by species


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mice_count_by_year_species <- surveys %>%
  group_by(year,species) %>%
  count()

ggplot(mice_count_by_year_species, aes(x= year, 
                                       y=n, 
                                       color=species,
                                       shape= species))+
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle("Mice count by year and species")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1980,2020,5))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: The shape palette can deal with a maximum of 6 discrete values because
more than 6 becomes difficult to discriminate; you have 20. Consider
specifying shapes manually if you must have them.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: Removed 321 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(mice_count_by_year_species, aes(x= year, 
                                       y=n, 
                                       color=species))+
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle("Mice count by year and species")+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1980,2020,5)) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Pregnancy by month


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
monthly_data <- surveys %>%
  mutate(month_string = lubridate::month(censusdate,label= T)) %>%
  group_by(month) %>%
  count(pregnant) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from=pregnant, values_from = n) %>%
  mutate(proportion_pregnant = P/(P+`NA`))

ggplot(monthly_data, aes(x=month, y=proportion_pregnant))+
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
